name: It's Falling Boxes! - 2.0
description:
It's Falling Boxes!

Dodge the falling obstacles and reach your highest scores in this fast-paced, 2D typing game where you type in the directions and commands as fast as possible, with unique combinations that you create on your own on the spot! 

An aesthetic theme blended with smooth controls and animations, test your typing skills! Simple controls, simple high score system combined with a single player theme.

Additional Info:

This project is a second revival of a concept I came up with around a year ago and made a similar rough 3D visualisation of, my previous project 'Its Falling Boxes!'. This is the very first version  of an ever-so expandable project of which some updates I have in mind including power-ups, varied maps and audio, and a dynamic background!
